      Methods in thing.dna.variator that return C_ChromosomePair 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      C_ChromosomePair C_RecombinatorMapGenome.crossover​(C_Chromosome xsome1, C_Chromosome xsome2)
      Perform 1-pt crossover on these two chromosomes and return the resulting new chromosome.
      C_ChromosomePair C_RecombinatorMicrosat.crossover​(C_Chromosome xtid1, C_Chromosome xtid2)
      Performs a full multi-point crossover on left and right strands of the C_XsomeMicrosat Retrieves a composite chromosome pair containing the value of NUMBER_GENES unlinked microsat locus.
      C_ChromosomePair C_RecombinatorNull.crossover​(C_Chromosome g1, C_Chromosome g2)  
      C_ChromosomePair C_RecombinatorOnePt.crossover​(C_Chromosome xtid1, C_Chromosome xtid2)
      Perform a one point crossover on these two chromosomes homologous and return a new chromosome pair.
      C_ChromosomePair I_Recombinator.crossover​(C_Chromosome g1, C_Chromosome g2)
      Perform some kind of crossover (1-pt, multi-point, probabilistic) on these two chromosomes.
